databases.name: PFAM
databases.citation: Mistry J et al. Pfam: The protein families database in 2021. Nucleic Acids Res. 2021;49(D1):D412-D419.
databases.notes: Contains GA, TC, NC bitscore cutoffs

databases.name: KOFAM
databases.citation: Aramaki T et al. KofamKOALA: KEGG Ortholog assignment based on profile HMM. Bioinformatics. 2020;36(7):2251-2252.

databases.name: DFAM
databases.citation: Storer J et al. The Dfam community resource of transposable element families. Mobile DNA. 2021;12:2.

databases.name: NCBI
databases.citation: Lu S et al. CDD/SPARCLE: the conserved domain database in 2020. Nucleic Acids Res. 2020;48(D1):D265-D268.

databases.name: dbCAN
databases.citation: Yin Y et al. dbCAN: a web resource for automated carbohydrate-active enzyme annotation. Nucleic Acids Res. 2012;40(W1):W445-W451.

databases.name: Resfam
databases.citation: Gibson MK et al. Improved annotation of antibiotic resistance functions. ISME J. 2015;9(1):207-216.

databases.name: AntiFam
databases.citation: Eberhardt RY et al. AntiFam: a tool to help identify spurious ORFs. Database. 2012;2012:bas003.

databases.name: FOAM
databases.citation: Prestat E et al. FOAM: Functional Ontology Assignments for Metagenomes. Nucleic Acids Res. 2014;42(19):e145.

databases.name: DefenseFinder
databases.citation: Tesson F et al. Systematic and quantitative view of the antiviral arsenal of prokaryotes. Nat Commun. 2022.

databases.name: PADLOC
databases.citation: Payne LJ et al. Identification and classification of antiviral defence systems in bacteria and archaea with PADLOC. Nucleic Acids Res. 2021;49(19):10868-10878.

databases.name: CANT-HYD
databases.citation: Khot V et al. CANT-HYD: A Curated Database for Annotation of Marker Genes Involved in Hydrocarbon Degradation. Front Microbiol. 2022;12:764058.

databases.name: NMPFamsDB
databases.citation: Baltoumas FA et al. NMPFamsDB: a database of novel protein families from microbial metagenomes. Nucleic Acids Res. 2024;52(D1):D592-D599.

databases.name: barrnap
databases.notes: 16S/23S rRNA HMMs from Rfam seed alignments
